issue.title: C++: Add schema adapter routines for converting flat Parquet schemas to in-memory Arrow schemas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-22](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-22). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Depends on ARROW-21. There's many cases to implement here (e.g. 3 kinds of Parquet list encoding that all map onto the single Arrow list type) so I may create follow-up JIRAs for some of the less-commonly-occurring Parquet schemas.
